title: Player Tag
summary: Player Tags are items that are collected from the wrecks of other players ships. They function as trophies showing that you destroyed a players ship. They can also be placed inside display cases, which can only be placed in residential spaces. They may be sold for 1 Credit at the NPC Marketplace, and take up space equivalent to 0.1 cubic meters.
full_text:
Player Tag
Player Tags are items that are collected from the wrecks of other players ships. They function as trophies showing that you destroyed a players ship. They can also be placed inside display cases, which can only be placed in residential spaces. They may be sold for 1 Credit at the NPC Marketplace, and take up space equivalent to 0.1 cubic meters.
